name: Drunken Master
description:
You went out for a night of heavy drinking, but it’s getting late, and you need to get back home. You are a hopelessly drunk and barely able to walk… quite unstable you might say. ;-)

Make your way back home before you succumb to your drunkenness. Avoid all the drunk dwarves in the streets. They mean business!

Controls
  • W A S D keys to steer
  • Often, keys will show on screen. If that happens, press the shown key repeatedly until the receding bar is full again. Don’t let the receding bar get to zero.
